Text: Sorry friends, but I forgot to put any detailed information in the Prager mp3's, so they may not play in your mp3 players. You'll may need to add details to each Prager hour. Sorry about that.

No problemos jwhitt, and I'll take this opportunity to post a small request =)

If you could name the files Prager... [Date] Hr [X] instead of the hr then date it would make it MUCH easier to sort them chronologically playing a few days back to back

Thanks again for your loyal uploads from you biggest fan in sweden
